QuestData.Title: By the Light of the Stars
QuestData.Description: Look at this, $n.$b$b<Harrison holds up the dead scout's goggles.>$b$bI tightened the clamp in the middle and crimped the wires on the edges. They may not be the most comfortable, but they should hold together.$b$bIf I've translated your tablets correctly, there's something hidden here - a final piece to our puzzle.$b$bI hope your spectacles hold the key.$b$bLet me know what you find!
QuestData.RewardText: Well, kid, it looks like you've done it again.$b$b<Harrison points to an image on the tablets.>$b$bThis starlight is exactly what we were missing.$b$bNow we can get to work!
